story:
****Thank you to all those who checked out our campaign due to lack on supporters we have decided to no longer offer planters on Indiegogo whilst we decide the right fit for our product. If you did support us we will in contact soon as we have decided to gift 72 pots to each of the initial supporters as a thank you, delivery charges apply shipping will commence in 48 hours of payment for postage. All perks have been removed except for buy me a cup of tea thank you for your time.****

Vertically-challenged's towering plant pots a stackable modular planter!
Project is flexfunded and already manufactured we can start shipping when indiegogo releases the funds. If you want to pay a premium for shipping separately we WILL SHIP BEFORE the end of the campaign for any plant pots claimed.




Help us change the way you grow forever!

Free delivery to UK on 12 pots or more.
Free delivery to most EU destinations including France, Germany,  on 24 pots or more,
1/2 price delivery to USA/Canada (We will match 1/2 the cost of delivery),
Free delivery to USA/Canada for 72 pots.

https://www.facebook.com/Vertically-challenged-512714052242988/
https://twitter.com/Vert_challenged

Resellers please contact sales@vertically-challenged.com

Indoor and outdoor compatible!

Very strong, excellent build quality for a long life!

Modular by design!

Ideal for organic or hydroponic growers!

Passionate development team with long term goals to change the way we grow.

Most the manufacturing has already taken place we aim to ship late January but guarantee a March shipping date in time for summer. 24/36/72 pot kits will be prioritised for indoor growers, Flower planters will ship last.

Project is flexible funded!

EU manufactured.

Even Mr our french Bulldog approves :)

T shirts available :)


About us

Welcome to our Indiegogo campaign we hope you like our idea and would like you to support us to revolutionise vertical growing for both indoor and outdoor users and fulfil our lifelong passions of supplying locally organically grown produce with a competitive co2 footprint to conventional food sources with the added satisfaction of home growing.

At Vertically challenged we believe in 3 golden rules passionately

  1. End users must always have a choice! Your grow system should be adaptable to almost any environment from balconies to greenhouses to wardrobes!
  2. To always try to look at things laterally, We believe this is what set's us apart from the competition our excellent build quality, modular design, multiple grow modes & excellent value for money.
  3. We believe that innovation is the key with your help this is only the beginning!

The pots are already manufactured in Lithuania and a limited supply is available now through a webshop in UK but we need extra funds for processing the 2nd batch which we are offering here for a discounted price and producing the first batches of the flower planters. The shipping time are over estimated. Funding is flexible all orders will be fulfilled.

We are asking for your help to develop our product further and hopefully have as much fun growing as we have :)

Very important! Delivery is not included in perks price on less than 12 pots (UK only see below for other countries).

Free delivery to UK on 12 pots or more.
Free delivery to most EU destinations including France, Germany,  on 24 pots or more.
1/2 price delivery to USA/Canada (We will match 1/2 the cost of delivery),
Free delivery to USA/Canada for 72 pots.

Delivery where applicable is charged at cost + 10% + £2 packaging cost and is payable when the planters are ready to ship. It is possible to organise shipping from Lithuania please contact us for more details.

Estimated costs for UK & EU (Most destinations) delivery <£10

We will ship to anywhere in the world and *you are welcome to organise your own shipping or collect from Nottingham, UK. (5 mins from J.27 M1)

*You will still be liable for packaging cost £4 and any import duties if applicable.


The planters

How do they stack?

2 pins enable the magic they both pull under tension, they are easy to stack but secure when both pins are fitted.

1. The outdoor growers

There are 2 types of planters for the outdoor grower

***We are no longer going to offer flower planters due to lack of interest***

The flower planter
Available as a flower planter in limited quantities the extra plant holes are punched out and cost 50p premium per pot.
The only difference is 6 plant holes instead of 1, ideal for making a flower tower.

A 6 pot tower is ~ 165cm tall.


Smaller lettuces will also perform well in a flower planter.


Veg planter
Ideal for growing edibles, only 1 plant hole per pot has 2 modes.

Mode A
Mode A is most suitable for tomatoes, chillies, lettuces, strawberries and more.

12 pots pictured are approx 111cm tall.




Mode B
In mode B the planters are positioned facing opposite each other and are connected by 80cm bars. A net is then secured to the connecting bars. You then train you plants though the holes in the mesh. This is useful for most tomatoes, cucumbers, strawberries, runner beans, etc.

Indoor growers.
The pot is equally happy indoors but due to lacking a dedicated drain it's not off the shelf compatible with recirculation although it is possible with raised trays.

The plant pot has some distinct advantages in indoors over traditional or existing vertical grow systems available.

Advantages
  1. Get more bang for your buck! In a 360° layout the the lamp hung vertically in the centre yields can almost double over a standard horizontal grow watt for watt.
  2. Get more from your space! Doubling or almost tripling growing area in a 1.5m*1.5m grow area (2.25m2) a total grow area of 6.48m2 with 72 pots
  3. It's modular meaning any height (Within reason is possible) and many different configurations and walls/stacks can be moved to get optimal light to plant distance for maximum growth and efficiency at all times.
  4. Veg times are reduced at one plant per pot veg times of 5-9 days, for 1 plant every other pot (Using a spacer pot) 14-18 days.
  5. Dynamically re-stackable at any time so dead pots can be removed and refreshed or spacer pots can be inserted if you have a plant that stretches in flower.
  6. If hand watered can be organic compatible and has no moving parts to fail.
  7. In a 4 sided arrangement perpetual harvests are possible

How many pots do i need?

There is no right or wrong answer as the pots are modular and there are 3 different build modes to use them in a variety of configurations round the lights your imagination is the limitation.

You must always support the walls of planters we recommend metal chain around the frame of the grow tent pulled tight to stop them toppling over.

But in our experience a good starting point is

Single walls for 1.2m*1.2m growing area's or less

20-24 pots to fill a 1.2M grow area from floor to ceiling and 2 400/600w HPS/MH



360° arrangement minimum recommended space 1.5m*1.5m

36 pots for a 360 degree arrangement with lamp in the centre approx 1m high with 1 600w/1kw or 2 400w. Pictured 1 600w MH with chillies and tomatoes.


72 pots for 360 degree arrangement around 2-3 600w or 2 1kw or 4 400w.


Other possible setups.
It is possible to set up microgrows in cupboards or similar best suited as either veg chambers for those wanting to go perpetual in their harvests or for the hobbyist grower.

 

What your funding will mean to us

Your funding will enable us to develop this product to maturity. We have many plans for where we would like to take this and this is just the tip of the iceberg. We need immediate funds for

  1. Continued development of the pot.
  2. Further R&D for using the planter with alternative light sources such as LED & fluorescents.
  3.  Development of several accessories.
  4. Assess the potential for an aquaponics/vertical planter off the shelf setup.

We would like to release a number of accessories* for the line including

  1. Telescopic pot sliders so you can dynamically adjust the distance between planters eliminating the need to use empty pots as spacers.
  2. A simple recirculation module to enable drainage or recirculation removing the need for trays and making the walls truly dynamic and simplifying irrigation.
  3. Pot stands so each stack can stand individually without support making the pots more dynamic in an indoor setting.
  4. Different length connecting bars
*We cannot guarantee backwards compatibility for all accessories.


If the funding goal is realised it will release much needed R&D funds for further growing tests and further development of an exciting secret feature.

Long  term goals

The eventual goal is to unite the veg and flower pot into a single piece without compromising form or function.

To open up exciting new possibilities in home food production indoor and outdoors.

To continue innovation both vertically and in other new surprising and exciting areas.

To continue development of a secret project!

What we would do with your money

£1000 build a co2 enhanced, aircon grow room for testing.

£5000 development and further testing of recirculation.

£10000 Also manufacture and delivery of recirculation accessory to market.

£15000 development of aquaponics add on we have tested already but need funds to manufacture and for CE certification.

£20000 Plant pot spacers so you grow much larger plants in the planter.

£30000 Plant pot stands so the can free stand at moment we recommend using a wall bracket for outdoors and supporting pots with chains when used indoors. The pots free stand fine already but become front heavy in flower.

£35000 Manufacture flat packs 1200l fish tank to go with the planters.

FAQ

General

Q. Are the planters compatible with hydroponics?

A. Yes the planters love coco, perlite/vermiculite mix, fytocell and other hydroponic mediums.

Q, What is the volume of the planter

A. 4l to brim, 3.5l to top of plant hole, 3l to bottom all sizes are approximate.

Q. How do I support the plants?

A. You can use a net or cane to support plants.

Q. How big a plant can I grow?

A. We grew medium sized tomato plants with little issues in 1 pot organically watering every other day.


Q. When will the planters ship?

A. The plant pots are already manufactured but need post processing work will be ready to ship Jan/Feb in plenty of time for new growing season.

Q. Do you ship to the [insert country here]?

A. P&P is done at cost +20% (original receipts for delivery will be forwarded as proof)  you are welcome to organise your own delivery but a packaging fee will apply.

Q. Are these planters hydroponic recirculation compatible?

A. They do not come with a recirculation tray we recommend DTW (Drain to waste) but it is possible to rig up a recirculation system by raising the floor and using trays. With your support we hope to offer a simplified value for money solution!

Indoors only

Q. How many plants should I use for my growing area?

A. This depends largely on the type of plants you want to grow, the amount of time you want to veg them for, how large you would like you plants to finish. When growing larger plants like tomatoes, or certain strains of chillies it often best to use an empty pot as a spacer to grow 1/2 the plants when growing indoors. When the plant grows too big for the available space unstack the pot and add an empty pot between the 2 pots then restack.

Q. What lighting is suitable for the planters?
A. HPS, MH, Varying wattages from 150w through to 1kw.
Fluorescent and LED's can be useful for leafy crops or vegetative growth or for hobbyist growing.

Q. Do I need a cool tube for HPS/MH lamps?
A. This is personal preference, cool tubes help with temperature and create a safe zone around the lamp but you do lose ~8% of the light. A bare lamp is more efficient and sometimes the heat can be beneficial but more care must be used.
WE DO NOT RECOMMEND WORKING INSIDE THE GROW AREA WITH THE LIGHTS ON!

Q. What size grow tent do I need to buy?
A. Depends on how you use it if using a 1.2M2 or smaller grow tent we recommend making a single wall 4 pots high. For 1.5M2 or larger grow tents we recommend 4 sides in a 360° arrangement which will also give highest yields.

Q, Will I need increased ventilation?
A. Yes since you will be growing 2-4 times more plants than traditional methods we recommend changing the air a minimum of 40 times per hour for maximum results.
story_txt:
****Thank you to all those who checked out our campaign due to lack on supporters we have decided to no longer offer planters on Indiegogo whilst we decide the right fit for our product. If you did support us we will in contact soon as we have decided to gift 72 pots to each of the initial supporters as a thank you, delivery charges apply shipping will commence in 48 hours of payment for postage. All perks have been removed except for buy me a cup of tea thank you for your time.****Vertically-challenged's towering plant pots a stackable modular planter!Project is flexfunded and already manufactured we can start shipping when indiegogo releases the funds. If you want to pay a premium for shipping separately we WILL SHIP BEFORE the end of the campaign for any plant pots claimed.Help us change the way you grow forever!Free delivery to UK on 12 pots or more.Free delivery to most EU destinations including France, Germany,  on 24 pots or more,1/2 price delivery to USA/Canada (We will match 1/2 the cost of delivery),Free delivery to USA/Canada for 72 pots.https://www.facebook.com/Vertically-challenged-512714052242988/https://twitter.com/Vert_challengedResellers please contact sales@vertically-challenged.comIndoor and outdoor compatible!Very strong, excellent build quality for a long life!Modular by design!Ideal for organic or hydroponic growers!Passionate development team with long term goals to change the way we grow.Most the manufacturing has already taken place we aim to ship late January but guarantee a March shipping date in time for summer. 24/36/72 pot kits will be prioritised for indoor growers, Flower planters will ship last.Project is flexible funded!EU manufactured.Even Mr our french Bulldog approves :)T shirts available :)About usWelcome to our Indiegogo campaign we hope you like our idea and would like you to support us to revolutionise vertical growing for both indoor and outdoor users and fulfil our lifelong passions of supplying locally organically grown produce with a competitive co2 footprint to conventional food sources with the added satisfaction of home growing.At Vertically challenged we believe in 3 golden rules passionately
End users must always have a choice! Your grow system should be 
adaptable to almost any environment from balconies to greenhouses to 
wardrobes!
To always try to look at things laterally, We believe this is what set's
 us apart from the competition our excellent build quality, modular 
design, multiple grow modes & excellent value for money.
We believe that innovation is the key with your help this is only the beginning!
The pots are already manufactured in Lithuania and a limited supply is available now through a webshop in UK but we need extra funds for processing the 2nd batch which we are offering here for a discounted price and producing the first batches of the flower planters. The shipping time are over estimated. Funding is flexible all orders will be fulfilled.We are asking for your help to develop our product further and hopefully have as much fun growing as we have :)Very important! Delivery is not included in perks price on less than 12 pots (UK only see below for other countries).Free delivery to UK on 12 pots or more.Free delivery to most EU destinations including France, Germany,  on 24 pots or more.1/2 price delivery to USA/Canada (We will match 1/2 the cost of delivery),Free delivery to USA/Canada for 72 pots.Delivery where applicable is charged at cost + 10% + £2 packaging cost and is payable when the planters are ready to ship. It is possible to organise shipping from Lithuania please contact us for more details.Estimated costs for UK & EU (Most destinations) delivery <£10We will ship to anywhere in the world and *you are welcome to organise your own shipping or collect from Nottingham, UK. (5 mins from J.27 M1)*You will still be liable for packaging cost £4 and any import duties if applicable.The plantersHow do they stack?2 pins enable the magic they both pull under tension, they are easy to stack but secure when both pins are fitted.1. The outdoor growersThere are 2 types of planters for the outdoor grower***We are no longer going to offer flower planters due to lack of interest***The flower planterAvailable as a flower planter in limited quantities the extra plant holes are punched out and cost 50p premium per pot.The only difference is 6 plant holes instead of 1, ideal for making a flower tower.A 6 pot tower is ~ 165cm tall.Smaller lettuces will also perform well in a flower planter.Veg planterIdeal for growing edibles, only 1 plant hole per pot has 2 modes.Mode AMode A is most suitable for tomatoes, chillies, lettuces, strawberries and more.12 pots pictured are approx 111cm tall.Mode BIn mode B the planters are positioned facing opposite each other and are connected by 80cm bars. A net is then secured to the connecting bars. You then train you plants though the holes in the mesh. This is useful for most tomatoes, cucumbers, strawberries, runner beans, etc.Indoor growers.The pot is equally happy indoors but due to lacking a dedicated drain it's not off the shelf compatible with recirculation although it is possible with raised trays.The plant pot has some distinct advantages in indoors over traditional or existing vertical grow systems available.Advantages
Get more bang for your buck! In a 360° layout the the lamp hung 
vertically in the centre yields can almost double over a standard 
horizontal grow watt for watt.
Get more from your space! Doubling or almost tripling growing area in a 
1.5m*1.5m grow area (2.25m2) a total grow area of 6.48m2 with 72 pots 

It's modular meaning any height (Within reason is possible) and many 
different configurations and walls/stacks can be moved to get optimal 
light to plant distance for maximum growth and efficiency at all times.
Veg times are reduced at one plant per pot veg times of 5-9 days, for 1 plant every other pot (Using a spacer pot) 14-18 days.
Dynamically re-stackable at any time so dead pots can be removed and 
refreshed or spacer pots can be inserted if you have a plant that 
stretches in flower.
If hand watered can be organic compatible and has no moving parts to fail.
In a 4 sided arrangement perpetual harvests are possible
How many pots do i need?There is no right or wrong answer as the pots are modular and there are 3 different build modes to use them in a variety of configurations round the lights your imagination is the limitation.You
 must always support the walls of planters we recommend metal chain 
around the frame of the grow tent pulled tight to stop them toppling 
over.But in our experience a good starting point isSingle walls for 1.2m*1.2m growing area's or less20-24 pots to fill a 1.2M grow area from floor to ceiling and 2 400/600w HPS/MH360° arrangement minimum recommended space 1.5m*1.5m36 pots for a 360 degree arrangement with lamp in the centre approx 1m high with 1 600w/1kw or 2 400w. Pictured 1 600w MH with chillies and tomatoes.72 pots for 360 degree arrangement around 2-3 600w or 2 1kw or 4 400w.Other possible setups.It is possible to set up microgrows in cupboards or similar best suited as either veg chambers for those wanting to go perpetual in their harvests or for the hobbyist grower. What your funding will mean to usYour funding will enable us to develop this product to maturity. We have many plans for where we would like to take this and this is just the tip of the iceberg. We need immediate funds for
Continued development of the pot.
Further R&D for using the planter with alternative light sources such as LED & fluorescents.
 Development of several accessories.

Assess the potential for an aquaponics/vertical planter off the shelf setup.

story:
Short Summary

Rapha Healthcare Services is a community healthcare provider in Kampala, Uganda that started operations in June 2011.We have a 4 bed in and out-patients facilty that includes a surgery where we provide obstetrics services and have carried out cleft lip and palate plastic surgery proceedures in collaboration with Smile Train.

Our care focus target is low and middle income families whom we desire to offer quality comprehensive care.

What We Need & What You Get

Through this campaign we are looking to raise a total of US$ 85,000.xx

US$ 25,000.xx to fund a container shipment of medical supplies and sundries which will enable us to improve our quality of services offering by getting us much needed brithing beds and medical sundries supplies that would enable us offer subsidized care to our clients whilst using superior quality medical devices and supplies.

US$ 35,000.xx to fund the pruchase of a comprehensive diagnostic ultrasound to improve our diagnostic capabilities espcially by enabling us do breast scans in our campaign against breast cancer plus cardiac and vascular scans in addressing the need for better diagnostics in dealing with the rising problem of cardiovascular disease.

US$ 30,000.xx to fund the purchase of a chemistry analyzer. This would imporve our diagnostic cpabilities and help us run a quality annual medical exam offering which we are promoting as part of our preventative care campaign.

The Impact

Your contribution will enable;

1. more women in our community receive better quality obstertic delivery services once we are able to upgrade our delivery ward from the shipment of supplies from Project CURE

2. enble us to continue to offer quality subsidized care to low income families who have benefited from a previous donation of sundries and supplies from Project CURE.

3. contribute to the fight aganist Breast cancer and cardiovascular disease as we shall have better diagnostic abilities which are greatly lacking in our community and country.

Other Ways You Can Help

1.spread the word and get people to contribute to this campaign.

2. donate medical equipment.

3. volunteer to offer medical camps with us.

story:
SPECIAL THANKS TO PAUL SITZMAN & MATT WILLOCKS FOR HELPING US RECORD OUR VIDEOS! YOU GUYS ROCK!

About Us, Part 1

About Us, Part 2

Thank you for taking the time to listen to our story! Please help us by spreading the word and asking others to contribute as well.

Quick Breakdown:
$7,050 - to cover the upfront cost of IVF
+ 4% - indiegogo fee = $7,332
Any remaining amount will help to cover PayPal fees and perks.



The Medical Process, Part 1

The Medical Process, Part 2

Willing to contribute, but not sure if you know anyone else that will? Why not make your contribution into an incentive? Copy and paste the following offer, and email it to your network:

"I'm ready to get involved, but I'd like your help. For every person that contributes $10 or more in the next 24hours, I will donate $10 (up to $100 and 10 people). Let's work together to help these two!"

Feel free to do an intro that fits you, and close it as you see fit. But this way, spreading the word now has an incentive, too!

PERKS - and the Importance of Teal

If you'd like to tout your teal on Sept. 13th, please order by Sept. 1st to ensure I get it to you on time! Of course, you can also wear your teal throughout the month of September as well.

Please know, any funds that go over our goal of $8,000 will go to affording the perks. Any remaining funds will go to the rest of the IVF costs.

Karen's Bad Joke 

We're intending to research and collect information on Ovarian Cancer so that we have an informational flyer ready by Friday, Sept. 13th (Stand Up to Cancer Day), for all to read, print out, and share.

Thanks, again, and let's make this a day to remember!

story:
I am writing on behalf of a dear friend, Suzanne S., who has struggled with health issues her whole life. Suzannne is seriously ill and in constant pain, resulting from Syringomyelia (a rare spinal cord disorder), fibromyalgia and neuropathy, she is now suffering with major tooth decay and needs treatment immediately.  Unable to work and indigent because of her health issues, she has hit rock-bottom and is now in desperate need of help to resolve her major dental problems.

Here is Suzanne's story, in her words: 

"Hi,

My name is Suzanne.

I am embarrassed to be asking for your help, but I have a VERY URGENT NEED!

 My rotting teeth are literally killing me!  

  

I have always been a strong independent person, but my pride and strength have gone away along with my teeth.

I am living with a rare spinal cord disorder called Syringomyelia, which is a large cavity inside my spinal cord that is slowly destroying my central nervous system.  I also have fibromyalgia and neuropathy. There is no cure for my disorder.

I live alone with no friends or family to help. Both of my parents are deceased. My Mom died of Cancer when I was 25 & my dad passed in 2001. I live on SSI which is $639 per month and Medicaid. Medicaid does not pay for any adult dental in Arizona, not even emergency extractions and all of my molars will have to be extracted by an Oral Surgeon so it wouldn't have helped me anyway.

I haven't been able to afford any dental care for well over 5 years. I went for a dental consultation in July, 2011 and the estimate was over $5500 to save 4 teeth. Unfortunately, because I could not afford this treatment due to lack of funds or credit, my dental condition has now deteriorated to an emergency situation. 

All of my back molars are rotted out with deep decay all the way to the jawbone and infection on both upper sides. I've had an exposed nerve root for 2 years and old root canals that are leaking poison into my mouth all day every day.

( Just imagine having an infected gaping wound for years & not being able to get medical attention for it, Then imagine it's in your mouth. This is the most painful thing I have ever dealt with & I have a cyst in my spinal cord, Fibromyalgia and Neuropathy. I also had a perotid tumor removed from my head & my tonsils taken out while awake & strapped to a chair.)

I am in unbearable pain and unable to eat most food!

I am increasingly bedridden due to the spinal cord disorder, severe muscle spasms & wasting and the dental decay & infection. The pain never eases; the continued antibiotics courses from my rotting teeth are destroying my stomach.

 

I can barely sit up in bed most days from my chronic illnesses and I have found a caring dentist Dr Betz and oral surgeon Dr Douglas Beals who will extract my back upper molars for $1,712.00 and I will need $1,963.00 for a partial denture. The exact cost of the treatment plan is $3,675.00. This amount will take care of the immediate emergency needs and get me out of excrutiating pain. Every penny raised will go for dental care. Any funds raised above that amount will got to restoring what is left of my teeth, since I still need fillings, cleaning & crowns to keep me from losing all of the rest of my teeth.

 

 Please help me smile again, the only hope I have is for your help and caring generosity!

All I can offer in the way of thanks is my heartfelt gratitude and my faith in God that people do care. Please give anything you can spare - even $10 can make a big difference in meeting my goal. Indiegogo takes 9% and Paypal takes 3% from each contribution, so please tag contributions as “Gift” on Paypal, which reduces fees taken. 


Lastly, time and energy are very valuable contributions and can't be underestimated, so if giving money is not an option for you then spreading the word about this campaign can help me so much. Please share my campaign with as many people as possible. You just never know who may be led to help ease my suffering.


Thank you all from the bottom of my heart for taking the time to read my story & I hope that whatever you give brings you good karma & comes back to you in beautiful unexpected ways.

Love and light,

Suzanne

story:
Second chances

I lost my job twice in my twenties. I lost my job again in my thirties - a time when my dearest friends and family's lives were changing in beautiful ways, of which I was envious. I, however, received the gift of time. I started yoga. I finally healed. And then I learned that I can do this  - well - and pass on my knowledge and yoga experience to others. I'm employed again now, but this is truly my dream: to complete a certified 200-hour yoga teacher training program and develop as a writer, while I continue to keep my full time job.
Eventual goals include:
* Teaching specific classes to assist those dealing with trapped emotions - mainly depression and anxiety. 
* Teaching strengthening and alignment classes to runners to help prevent injury.
* Teaching yoga to elderly people who may live in assisted living/lower income communities in order to create community and help them move, if they have physical and mobility limitations. 
*Self publish my book of essays and continue to write. 

What I need:

Here's the breakdown of where your funds will go:

  • $3,000 for my certification - $500 deposit needed by September. 
  • $1,000 for materials: books, yoga mat, additional course items as needed.
  • $1,000 to independently publish my book and promote it via the internet. 
UPDATE: If the goal is not met, I will do what I can because Indiegogo take a portion of the money raised, and make donations to Yoga Activist fit http://www.yogaactivist.org/ (note: they have no idea that I am doing this yet) and one of my dearest friends' funds set up in the memory of her father: http://action.ajws.org/site/TR?pg=fund&fr_i... 

The Impact

Who knows? But to best describe what I hope to achieve,  I turn to an author very dear to my heart, F. Scott Fizgerald and his words. 

I want to enable others to understand this quote for themselves:

“For what it’s worth: it’s never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be. There’s no time limit, stop whenever you want. You can change or stay the same, there are no rules to this thing. We can make the best or the worst of it. I hope you make the best of it. And I hope you see things that startle you. I hope you feel things you never felt before. I hope you meet people with a different point of view. I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the courage to start all over again.”

F. Scott Fitzgerald

This is scary. This is new territory. But I cannot be satisfied with the status quo and I need your help to move forward, simply because society and the economy are the way that they are. And that I feel there is more to my life than sitting behind a desk.
story_txt:
Second chances
I lost my job twice in my twenties. I lost my job again in my thirties - a time when my dearest friends and family's lives were changing in beautiful ways, of which I was envious. I, however, received the gift of time. I started yoga. I finally healed. And then I learned that I can do this  - well - and pass on my knowledge and yoga experience to others. I'm employed again now, but this is truly my dream: to complete a certified 200-hour yoga teacher training program and develop as a writer, while I continue to keep my full time job.
Eventual goals include:
* Teaching specific classes to assist those dealing with trapped emotions - mainly depression and anxiety. 
* Teaching strengthening and alignment classes to runners to help prevent injury.
* Teaching yoga to elderly people who may live in assisted living/lower income communities in order to create community and help them move, if they have physical and mobility limitations. 
*Self publish my book of essays and continue to write.    What I need: Here's the breakdown of where your funds will go: 
$3,000 for my certification - $500 deposit needed by September.  $1,000 for materials: books, yoga mat, additional course items as needed. $1,000 to independently publish my book and promote it via the internet.  
UPDATE: If the goal is not met, I will do what I can because Indiegogo take a portion of the money raised, and make donations to Yoga Activist fit http://www.yogaactivist.org/ (note: they have no idea that I am doing this yet) and one of my dearest friends' funds set up in the memory of her father: http://action.ajws.org/site/TR?pg=fund&fr_i...

This is scary. This is new territory. But I cannot be satisfied with the status quo and I need your help to move forward, simply because society and the economy are the way that they are. And that I feel there is more to my life than sitting behind a desk.

story:
According to a recent study, 50% of kids are addicted to their phones & tablets.  TimeAway lets parents remotely monitor and set controls on their kids' devices, ranging from time summaries, location finders, time-off schedules and app time limits.

TimeAway is now available for BETA TESTING! :)  To download, complete these two steps:

1. Join the G+ group: https://plus.google.com/communities/109202724077720176022

2. Download the app: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.timeaway

When your child first learned to ride a bike, did you simply put her on a two-wheeler and let her go?

Probably not. It was a process, moving from a tricycle to training wheels to a two-wheeler. You were on the sidelines coaching her through the entire process.

It's the same with TimeAway. Our Android app lets you put boundaries on the internet, so your kid can gradually learn to become a responsible citizen of the internet.

It's the perfect solution for your kid's first phone or tablet!



You install TimeAway on both the parent and kids' devices (works on both Android phones & tablets).

After installing, you can enjoy all the features from the parent device, including: 

  • Monitor your kids' device usage & app downloads 
  • Locate your kid when they are "on the go" 
  • Pause all devices for family events, like dinner time 
  • Set "TimeAway" schedules, like school time or bedtime 
  • Create time limits for apps, like Instagram or AngryBirds
  • Block apps, like SnapChat

For more information, check out www.time-away.com



I've designed the entire UX and functionality of the app, but I've used a developer, Ahmad, to make all my mocks a reality.  The app is currently a fully functioning prototype that I've been meticulously testing everyday.  The $5000 will got to development.


Pledgers will be first to get the TimeAway app forever on their Android phones / tablets, along with a few monkey prizes!

We all know that the internet is an AMAZING place (Indiegogo is a prime  example)!  We have access to the world's information at our finger tips, but it's also incredibly easy to become addicted (a new study shows that 50% of teens are addicted to the internet).  

I hope this Indiegogo community supports kids learning to use to internet responsibly while still maintaing a healthy life offline.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please spread the word to parents out there that need a solution for their kids' phones & tablets.  It's good karma!

story:
Who is My Yoga?


Hello my name is Maddy Strauss, my life passion is hot yoga and my life's purpose is  sharing it with as many people as possible.  My love of hot yoga started 13 years ago when I was first introduced to the practice.  It has  been a life transforming experience and continues to be.  Every class is a challenge and offers the opportunity to strengthen, grow, and heal physically, mentally and emotionally.   I started the company in 2009.  My Yoga has come a long way since then. When the company was born 5 years ago we started in a 400 square foot studio space that was warmed with space heaters.  My Yoga then reached adolescence, and moved into a fitness space that we shared with a gym. We have encountered many challenges  over the years, but never gave up on  our hopes and dreams to have our very own space.  

We are proud to say that My Yoga is all grown up now and ready to show you just how committed we are to sharing hot yoga with the community.  In just a few short weeks we will be opening our doors and our hearts and inviting you to take this journey with us.  

What you can do for us & What we will do for you

We are trying to raise $12,000 to help us complete the final stages of construction.  The funds we hope to raise will cover the costs of:

  • Studio ventilation system
  • Studio mirrors
  • 3 showers
  • Eco-friendly cork flooring 
In exchange for your support and contributions we will offer you:
  •  Class packages at super discounted rates!
  •  Free private classes!
  •  Free goods!
  •  Free 60 and 90 minute massage packages with a therapist on site!

The Impact your contribution can make


By helping us finish this project and open our doors you will have the ability to change many lives. Hot yoga is not only a great physical workout, but it is a way of life.  It gets us in touch with who we really are, it teaches us how to live with less ego and more truth.  It helps to improve our relationships with ourselves and with others.  It empowers us and gives us the strength and courage we need to make better choices in our lives.  

When one life is changed through hot yoga there is a ripple effect... people around us notice the changes and want to be a part it.  Happiness, love and peace attract more happiness, love and peace.  Collectively we have the power to make the world a better place!


    Other Ways You Can Help us

    We understand if you are not be capable of supporting us financially. 

    We appreciate you helping us spread the word about our campaign.  Please share this with as many people as you can.

story: Recently I had a chance to meet beautiful Ruby she is 9 years old and a "big buddy" with my daughter at their school.Just before christmas Ruby relapsed with leukemia it's hard enough to battle cancer the first time but the second time just seems so much harder.So here's where we all come in.I have set up this account to help eleviate the financial distress that comes hand in hand with a child going through treatment. Ruby will be staying a lengthy time at BC Childrens hospital going through treatment and fighting once again against the evil thing called cancer while mom is with her,dad is back home working and taking Ruby's little brother to school and being together as a family only on the weekend.So lets open our hearts and our wallets and help out a family in need. Thank you all in advance

story:
Your support made the difference

Thank you from all the Empatica Team

The campaign has been concluded
THIS PAGE IS OUTDATED

The information in this page won't be updated anymore. Please refer to the Empatica official website.

You can order the Embrace here

Embrace is a watch that looks great on anyone. It can track your activity, stress and overall balance.

It is designed to bring a better lifestyle to people that live with Epilepsy: they get an alert when an unusual event happens, like a convulsive seizure, warning them and their loved ones.

EMBRACE IN THE PRESS

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT

BUY 1 GIVE 1 INITIATIVE

Thanks for your support, you made possible to donate 1,540 Embrace watches to families in need that live with epilepsy.

Discover more: Am I eligible for a donated Embrace?

EMBRACE EXPERIENCE

A GORGEOUS SMART WATCH FOR YOU

Embrace is a medical quality device to monitor and better understand your behavior. Embrace is designed to be a gorgeous watch: the band is lush Italian leather and the case is strong, polished metal.

Embrace is the thinnest smart watch of this kind ever made. It snaps on, then tightens with a magnet for perfect fit.

You can choose to use it simply as a watch to tell time, in which case your battery should last 6 months.

Embrace makes it very easy to monitor physiological stress, arousal, sleep and physical activity.

You can check your entire day in a glance in a way that is easy to understand. Not only during exercise, but also at work, during your commute, during the night. If you push yourself too much, the Embrace will gently remind you with a vibration, that you need some time to recover. You can customize it to suit your needs and behavior.

This is what wearables were supposed to be: quiet, small, useful.

DESIGNED TO SAVE LIVES

When people that have Epilepsy wear Embrace, they will get an alert when an unusual event happens, like a convulsive seizure. It will go via their smartphone to parents, roommates or caregivers, so somebody can check on them. Additionally, one of these caregivers can wear a 'companion' Embrace too. When the two Embraces are within range (e.g. in nearby rooms), the 'companion' Embrace worn by the caregivers will vibrate to alert them.

Discover more: Can Embrace work with any type of seizure?

Electrodermal activity, or EDA, is autonomic data that is activated by regions deep in the brain involved in emotions such as fear, anxiety, and positive excitement. It is strongly activated during the kinds of seizures that involve a region of the brain that has been shown to shut down breathing. If you are interested in the scientific literature, you can check it here.

You can see the powerful medical findings that can be obtained from our work in journals such as Epilepsia, Neurology, Nature - and we are planning to go for FDA clearance.

IF YOU GET AN EMBRACE, A CHILD WITH EPILEPSY WILL GET ONE TOO

Your Embrace will help someone to have a better life.

We are partnering with the Epilepsy foundation and private donors.

Due to the generosity of a group of donors that know Empatica and its mission, the first 4000 Embrace watches purchased by this campaign before Dec 24, 2014 BEFORE JANUARY 21st will be matched 1:1, loaded with the seizure detector app, and donated to the Epilepsy Foundation for distribution to families in need.

1 of every 26 people in the USA will suffer from Epilepsy at some point in their lifetime (Institute of Medicine, 2012). Today, approximately 65 million people suffer from Epilepsy worldwide.

More people die of SUDEP (Sudden Unexpected Death in Epilepsy) than of house fires every year. But every home has a smoke detector. Everybody with epilepsy should have a device that alerts people in their vicinity so that they can promptly provide assistance when needed. Your purchase here can contribute to build a better world for these people!

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT

MEDICAL GRADE TECHNOLOGY

Some of our clients are listed above. You can find many more at www.empatica.com.

We have gained a lot of experience in wearable technology and have successfully delivered products. Our first model, E3, is the most comfortable and accurate wristband to monitor physiological signals in real time. It is used today by many of the world's most famous hospitals, universities, and companies to study human behavior in real life. We recently introduced the new version, the E4 wristband. (You can learn more here).

We are completing the process for the E4 wristband to receive clearance as a Medical device in Europe, and we are planning to do the same with FDA in the US. We also are preparing this for Embrace. We are very researcher-friendly and also provide open APIs, so that you can build whatever app you want, while we take care of the difficult parts.

WHAT THE EXPERTS SAY

OUR STORY

In 2007, Prof. Picard's team at the MIT Media Lab developed a wearable that measured changes on the surface of the skin communicating the main component of stress. For the first time in daily life, you could easily see when stress started to grow, even before you might notice it.

While trying to help people with autism to be better understood, Picard found an unusually huge response from one participant. It turned out to be a seizure! This led to new investigations with Boston Children's hospital in Boston. With data from over 90 patients, the team learned they had built a more accurate method for seizure detection. Their research became published in top peer-reviewed medical and engineering journals, patents were issued, and a version of their sensor is now in use in hundreds of top labs, universities, and hospitals.

While research continues for epilepsy and other medical conditions, many families have asked us for a personal version of the device to give alerts when a seizure might be happening. Experts tell us that these alerts could save lives. Also, many friends keep asking us for a low-cost version “to see when stress is escalating” in themselves or a spouse or child. Our wearable can help with all of these needs!

At Empatica, we marry the best science with the best of design and customer experience. We're proud to finally be launching Embrace, addressing the needs of all – whether you live with stress, seizures, or simply want a gorgeous way to tell the time!

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT

EMBRACE FEATURES

EMBRACE APPS

Embrace can run multiple apps in real time, sending data wirelessly to your phone.

Discover more: Which phones and tablets work with the Embrace?

At launch, Embrace will come with two apps:

(1) Empatica Mate, personal stress, sleep, and activity feedback for everybody. Empatica Mate also comes with a diary for understanding better your daily life.

(2) Empatica Alert, an event detector for people with Epilepsy.

Empatica Mate

This app will provide you with customized insights on your behavior. You can set up Embrace to vibrate when you reach a certain level that you want to monitor. For example, you can set it to vibrate gently when your body's stress level is climbing, before it gets too high, while you can still have a positive response.

Empatica Mate makes it easy for you to see how your body's stress levels changed with your daily activities.

Empatica Mate can also show detail how your body's stress level changed during each of your daily activities, like commuting by car vs. bike, meeting with your boss vs. a friend, and physical activity.

Monitoring System

Empatica Alert

In addition to the capabilities above, you will be able to monitor events that might be a convulsive seizure, and get an alert that will go both to the wearer (where it can be silenced if needed) and to selected family members or friends who can bring help.

Discover more: How quickly can the caregiver be notified?

This app will have a premium service with more features. All those who buy an Embrace during Indiegogo will have 6 months of access to the Premium version.

Alert System

APIs

Like we did with our research device, we plan to open our APIs, so that many other medical conditions can benefit from the same data.

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT

ABOUT

MILESTONES

This is our plan for Embrace

TEAM

We are an ultra passionate team, based in Milan (Italy) and Cambridge (USA).

DATA + SERVICE

We take a great deal of care into protecting your personal information. The data are ultra secure and private, with state of the art encryption.

We think data about yourself should be owned by you. We might ask you to allow your data to be used to improve research and benefit science, but every system will be opt-in and you can choose freely to participate or not.

USE OF FUNDS

Your money is in experienced and trustworthy hands, because we already have a reputable name and have delivered successful products to top researchers and hospitals. Also we are working on Embrace with top industrial designers (Pearl Studios) and with one of the best manufacturers of well-known successful consumer devices. We already have prototypes in hand being tested and iterated on. Your funds will be used to expedite making this product a reality, as tooling and production are very expensive to do with the highest quality, and we set a high bar.

Your contribution will make this fine product a reality AND will help people living with Epilepsy!

QUOTES FROM THE PRESS

Wired

"The Embrace has the slickness of a Jawbone Up and the brains of a PhD student."

Forbes

"The ultra thin Embrace is the culmination of several years of research."

Gizmodo

"A fascinating story about the role of accidental discoveries in science and design."

Mit Technology Review

"Makes it easier for people with epilepsy to detect seizures and let others know when they need help."

NewScientist

"Embrace, is rather different from the latest offerings from Apple, Samsung and Motorola: it can spot the warning signs of an epileptic seizure."

Kurzweil Accelerating Intelligence

"A diary for understanding your daily life better."

Wired.co.uk

"Embrace is the medical-grade wearable we've been waiting for."

Nature

"A wearable device that monitors seizures, promises improvements in epilepsy treatments and research"

MIT Spectrum

"The final product design is sleek and minimal—a key consideration in encouraging people to wear medical devices."

FastCoDesign

"The Embrace isn't just an attractive looking smartwatch that can do all the usual fitness-tracker tricks. It's designed to help epileptics track and manage their seizures without feeling stigmatized."

Fox News

"Because Embrace tracks day-to-day activity, the data retrieved may help researchers further understand the factors that can be attributed to seizures."

Time

"It can also do something most watches don’t: send out an epilepsy alert."

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT

SUPPORT CENTER

We are amazed and overwhelmed by the amount of comments, emails and requests that we are receiving. Thank you all for your interest in the Embrace! Visit our support center for more information.

If your question is not responded by our FAQs you can easily submit a new request.

THANKS!

Thank you from all the Empatica Team

While research continues for epilepsy and other medical conditions, many families have asked us for a personal version of the device to give alerts when a seizure might be happening. Experts tell us that these alerts could save lives. Also, many friends keep asking us for a low-cost version “to see when stress is escalating” in themselves or a spouse or child. Our wearable can help with all of these needs!
At Empatica, we marry the best science with the best of design and customer experience. We're proud to finally be launching Embrace, addressing the needs of all – whether you live with stress, seizures, or simply want a gorgeous way to tell the time!

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT EMBRACE FEATURES


EMBRACE APPS
Embrace can run multiple apps in real time, sending data wirelessly to your phone.
Discover more: Which phones and tablets work with the Embrace?

At launch, Embrace will come with two apps:
(1) Empatica Mate, personal stress, sleep, and activity feedback for everybody. Empatica Mate also comes with a diary for understanding better your daily life.
(2) Empatica Alert, an event detector for people with Epilepsy.
Empatica Mate
This app will provide you with customized insights on your behavior. You can set up Embrace to vibrate when you reach a certain level that you want to monitor. For example, you can set it to vibrate gently when your body's stress level is climbing, before it gets too high, while you can still have a positive response.

Empatica Mate makes it easy for you to see how your body's stress levels changed with your daily activities.

Empatica Mate can also show detail how your body's stress level changed during each of your daily activities, like commuting by car vs. bike, meeting with your boss vs. a friend, and physical activity.
Monitoring System

Empatica Alert
In addition to the capabilities above, you will be able to monitor events that might be a convulsive seizure, and get an alert that will go both to the wearer (where it can be silenced if needed) and to selected family members or friends who can bring help.
Discover more: How quickly can the caregiver be notified?
This app will have a premium service with more features. All those who buy an Embrace during Indiegogo will have 6 months of access to the Premium version.

Alert System

APIs
Like we did with our research device, we plan to open our APIs, so that many other medical conditions can benefit from the same data.

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT ABOUT
MILESTONES
This is our plan for Embrace


TEAM
We are an ultra passionate team, based in Milan (Italy) and Cambridge (USA).



DATA + SERVICE
We take a great deal of care into protecting your personal information. The data are ultra secure and private, with state of the art encryption.
We think data about yourself should be owned by you. We might ask you to allow your data to be used to improve research and benefit science, but every system will be opt-in and you can choose freely to participate or not.

USE OF FUNDS
Your money is in experienced and trustworthy hands, because we already have a reputable name and have delivered successful products to top researchers and hospitals. Also we are working on Embrace with top industrial designers (Pearl Studios) and with one of the best manufacturers of well-known successful consumer devices. We already have prototypes in hand being tested and iterated on. Your funds will be used to expedite making this product a reality, as tooling and production are very expensive to do with the highest quality, and we set a high bar.
Your contribution will make this fine product a reality AND will help people living with Epilepsy!


 QUOTES FROM THE PRESS
Wired
"The Embrace has the slickness of a Jawbone Up and the brains of a PhD student."
Forbes
"The ultra thin Embrace is the culmination of several years of research."
Gizmodo
"A fascinating story about the role of accidental discoveries in science and design."
Mit Technology Review
"Makes it easier for people with epilepsy to detect seizures and let others know when they need help."
NewScientist
"Embrace, is rather different from the latest offerings from Apple, Samsung and Motorola: it can spot the warning signs of an epileptic seizure."
Kurzweil Accelerating Intelligence
"A diary for understanding your daily life better."
Wired.co.uk
"Embrace is the medical-grade wearable we've been waiting for."
Nature
"A wearable device that monitors seizures, promises improvements in epilepsy treatments and research"
MIT Spectrum
"The final product design is sleek and minimal—a key consideration in encouraging people to wear medical devices."
FastCoDesign
"The Embrace isn't just an attractive looking smartwatch that can do all the usual fitness-tracker tricks. It's designed to help epileptics track and manage their seizures without feeling stigmatized."
Fox News
"Because Embrace tracks day-to-day activity, the data retrieved may help researchers further understand the factors that can be attributed to seizures."
Time
"It can also do something most watches don’t: send out an epilepsy alert."

Jump to: ORDER NOW - EXPERIENCE - TECHNOLOGY - FEATURES - SUPPORT SUPPORT CENTER
We are amazed and overwhelmed by the amount of comments, emails and requests that we are receiving. Thank you all for your interest in the Embrace! Visit our support center for more information.
If your question is not responded by our FAQs you can easily submit a new request.
THANKS!

story:
Why Mackenna needs your help

I was living with my boyfriend, without a rent payment until the beginning of August. He and I broke up and that day I had to move out of his house, making it nearly impossible to work consistently & afford bills, find a place to stay, or get groceries. I got behind on bills pretty fast, since I moved out with no money (having spent my last bit of money on groceries for my ex boyfriend's house).  I have jaw surgery at the end of October, and I was hoping to be ahead on bills, because recovery takes between 6-8 weeks minimum, and I'm sure I won't be feeling up to working with a swollen jaw and my mouth wired shut, so I'm asking YOUR help, whether it be you sharing this link, or donating what you can (EVEN 1$ HELPS SIGNIFICANTLY), so that I can get back on track with bills, pay for the 500$ deductible required for my surgery, afford food, gas, and get ahead so I can get my surgery over with and not have the worry or stress of wondering how I'll get groceries or pay for my car.
I found roommates, I just need to be able to afford a few months rent to ensure I have a stable home to recover from surgery in. Rent is about 300$ per month including utilities.

What I Need & What You Get

Any amount of sharing this fundraiser and any amount of money is highly appreciated. The money will be going straight towards past due bills, catching me up, helping pay for the surgery, assisting in getting an apartment, food, gas & (hopefully) bills through recovery (and hospital bills if insurance doesn't cover the full surgery).
I will be rewarding those who help out in any way with whatever I can, such as videos, photos, cam outfits i've worn mailed to you discreetly, skype dates, etc.

The Impact

I need to be financially stable through December, so that I can get back to working consistently and keep on the right track, after such a huge setback in August, then having such a slow month in September, despite consistently working 2x per day, only months before surgery. I will be making "post surgery update" videos as well and posting them on twitter, so everyone can keep up with how things are going physically, emotionally, & financially.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this fundraiser everywhere!

story:
We obtained a patent for our system last year in 2016.  We've spent countless hours coming up with a design that's both minimalistic and efficient.  The resulting 3-in-1 platform is as follows:

  1. Camera rig - all the hardware needed to capture your action
  2. Studio mobile app - use to compile/edit/upload your footage (subscription-based)
  3. MyTechni360 mobile app - use to view and share 360° content (free to download and use)

Let's Start With The Rig Setup

Items shown will be available for purchase from http://www.techni360.com:

  • Beginning with the base, we designed it to be as obscure as possible (low-profile and gray in color).  8 pieces snap together
  • Screwing onto the base are barely-there (1/4") steel monorods that hold your cameras
  • Sitting on top of the monorods are the combo of mount adapters + GoPros
  • Assembly is just a few quick turns
  • Wrapping it up, the Smart Remote allows you to simultaneously start/stop recording all at once

 

(Components not to scale)

 

Next Is Studio App

Designed for businesses, Studio is subscription-based and geared towards professionals who can benefit from showcasing themselves via a new and unique platform.  Since it's undergoing development, the following is a preview of its core features: 

 

If all you need are front, back, and side views, a 4-camera setup will suffice.  However, the more cameras you use, the more perspectives you'll capture - creating more "smoothness" as viewers spin through the rotation.

 

The base camera represents the starting point of the rotation.  Selecting the base camera allows Studio to use it as the main shot.

 

 

With the base camera selected, you'll be able to preview the main shot and make edits to it that apply to all cameras in the setup, creating even uniformity.

 

Once you're happy with the preview, uploading the set is a snap!  Moreover, we designed a Queue option that allows you to queue footage for upload at a later time.  This might be useful when you want to record in succession, or may not have internet/cellular connectivity at the site.

 

 

Third, MyTechni360 App

MyTechni360 is intended for use by anyone with access to a smartphone, free to download and use.  Users will be able to view content that has been made public or shared to a group.  Since it's undergoing development, the following is a preview of its core features:

 

After logging in, videos are displayed in list view.  You'll be able to to search for content as well as sort them by title, user, or date.

 

Once you see a clip you like, you can select it for a closer look.  You'll be able to spin the subject round-and-round and, for the first time, see action in full 360°!  This is the heart of our offering.  Then comment or leave questions for an interactive experience.

 

 

 

 

Sharing is caring.  Where is the beauty in our platform, if not shared?  With your content saved to My Videos, you can create Groups of users and share them at any time!  

 

 

Altogether, It's As Easy As... 1-2-3!

 

Introducing Our Team

We're currently 5 strong, based out of beautiful Southern California.  Our background includes:

  • Project Management
  • Mechanical Engineering
  • Software Development
  • Marketing

Ingredients we hope will make us successful are our life-long passion for sports & fitness and decades-long experience working in technology.

Why We Decided To Crowdfund

After working on the project willy nilly for the course of a year, we've finally picked up steam.  It became clear we needed to focus our efforts if we are to seriously and legitimately continue onward.  With your contributions, you'll help us:

  • Cover the costs of development of 2 apps ($40,000 USD)
  • Purchase print advertising ($10,000 USD est.)

Risks & Challenges

Software development can be nuanced and complex.  Technical hurdles often appear that weren't anticipated or bugs surface that are challenging to fix.  That said, we're confident we can handle them for two very simple reasons:

  1. We're sports and fitness enthusiasts - that makes us inherently competitive and perseverant 
  2. We're technologically savvy.  We've spent decades doing what we do and love it!

Other Ways You Can Help

There's other ways you can help us besides monetarily:

  • Help spread the word and share this across your social media feeds
  • Try Indiegogo's share tools (to the right of the Back It button)

And that's all there is to it!

Purchase print advertising ($10,000 USD est.)

story:
The Aim

A year ago, I decided I wanted to raise money for a charity or organisation that was involved in sharing the Gospel of Jesus with people around the world. In thinking about how I might go about achieving that dream, I realised I had lots of hair, and didn't need it... So, the rest just sort of followed from there. I've been growing my hair for a whole year now, and am going to shave it on the 1st of November, 2014. In the month and a bit leading up to that date (and starting from now), I'm going to be raising as much money as I can for OMF Australia. My hope is to raise at least $1000 to put towards their work in East Asia.

Some Information about OMF Australia

OMF Australia is a Christian organisation that seeks to bring the gospel to all the peoples of East Asia. Founded by James Hudson Taylor in 1865, they aim to place Christians throughout East Asia, and share the love of Christ with East Asians worldwide. You can find out more information about OMF Australia by going to their website.

As a Christian, I'm passionate about seeing the Good News of Jesus Christ spread all over the world, and I want to support the amazing work that OMF do. So, ALL the money that you donate for this campaign will be given directly to OMF Australia, either to generally fund their work, or to fund a more specific mission. More information about exactly where the money is going will be provided closer to November.

Some Incentive to Give

Now if you're thinking that me having a shiny, bald head isn't incentive enough to give generously to this fundraising campaign, that's ok, because I agree. So, whoever gives the largest amount of money towards my fundraising for OMF Australia will be given the power to choose a colour for me to dye my hair to for the final week of fundraising before I shave my head. Will it be pink? or fluro green? or intense, bleached white? It's up to you!

    Share

    Please consider joining me in my efforts of raising money for OMF Australia by contributing generously to this cause. 

    ... and maybe you don't have the money to contribute to this fundraising campaign at the moment. That's OK. What you CAN do is share both this campaign and the work that OMF Australia do with anyone and everyone! I would love to double, or even TRIPLE my goal of $1000 and bless OMF Australia with a great amount of money they can use to put towards their mission work. 

    So spread the word on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and whatever other social media accounts you may have! Check out the share options at the top of the page if you're struggling to know where to start.

    Thanks so much for your generous help in supporting this cause. You're all brilliant!

story:
It's time for a positive Change

IMAGINE THE POSITIVE CLIMATE CHANGE possible by using DCARBON on millions of vehicles WORLDWIDE, thereby creating less toxic pollutants such as hydrocarbons (HC), carbon monoxide (CO) and nitrogen oxides (NOx).

This can be initiated by creating a GLOBAL grassroots movement of up to 5,000 motor vehicles owners/leasers who will become active SMOG BUSTERS by making their own motor vehicles environmentally friendly.

The worldwide motor vehicle fleet will take at least 15-20 years to change and become 100% ECO-Responsible…we should and can do something NOW to improve AIR Quality.



September 21, 2014, lot of peoples took to the streets calling for climate action…more than on any other day in history. From New York City to Rio, London to Delhi – they were everywhere.


From now on, more world leaders will gather to talk about climate action than ever before. They’ll be gather with the knowledge that more people than ever are demanding action, not just words, and that their political future is on the line -- as well as the future of the planet.

The 2014 launch phase is to manufacture a massive quantity of DCarbon products and to provide FREE DCarbon units for gasoline motor vehicles (cars and small trucks) of less than 6 liter capacity to the DCarbon Campaign participants, based on the contribution rules described on the indiegogo site. This will be done in order to create a global group of 5,000 users who will have made their vehicle more eco-responsible, and who will be able to testify and demonstrate that it is really possible to improve the AIR quality emitted by exhaust pipes of Gas Engine vehicles using the DCarbon product. 

OUR promise is that the emissions that cause serious health problems for humans which are caused by the incomplete combustion of fuels while producing HC (unburned hydrocarbons), CO (carbon monoxide) and NOx (nitrogen oxides) are reduced or completely removed at the exhaust pipes of the gas engine vehicles by an improvement of the fuel combustion by using DCarbon.

We have obtained scientific proof and passed many tests which confirm that the DCarbon product is safe for humans and improves AIR quality at the exhaust pipe of Gas engine vehicles.

Go to the www.dcarbondevice.com to learn more about our test results.

One of the professionals who support this technology is the Canadian engineer Mark Porringa,www.zeroptech.com, He describes the technology behind the DCarbon product as a scientific and technological revolution equivalent to the discovery of electricity almost 100 years ago.


The DCarbon product is VERY easy to install yourself, it does not create any electrical or electronic interference and its 10 year + lifetime enables it to be reinstalled on other engines of the same type.



Today we want to take another step forward... Bring this product to the world stage so that the population itself can, by reducing costs through mass production of DCarbon, improve AIR quality for EVERYONE.

Today the technology that supports DCarbon is protected in 183 countries by the copyright system www.usdsystem.com.




Potential impact

Air pollution created by more than 1 billion vehicles is a global curse that affects the health of all the world's inhabitants. 

Knowing that worldwide vehicle fleet will take at least 15-20 years to change and become 100% ECO-Responsible…What can we do collectively NOW.

TOGETHER we can MAKE A POSITIVE CLIMATE CHANGE by using the DCarbon technology on millions of vehicles WORLDWIDE and therefore producing less toxic pollutants like HC, CO, and NOx!


To illustrate the fantastic potential of the DCarbon product to reduce the emissions of toxic and mortal Carbon Monoxide (CO) emissions, we will use as an example a City where 1 million gas engine vehicles are in circulation, each covering an average of 10,000 miles a year.


Based on EPA (Environmental Protection Agency) records, in 1950’s, the emission standard for carbon monoxide (CO) was 87 gram per miles. In comparison from 2015-2019 the future USA California emission standard is at a maximum of 3.4 grams per mile (during a vehicle lifetime of 50,000 miles?).

Using this most recent legal limit for Carbon Monoxide (CO) in our city of 1 million gas engine vehicles, this group will emit 34 millions kilograms of toxic and mortal CO in the AIR per year, and up to 170 millions kilograms over 5 years. WE CAN DEFINITELY have a better life WITHOUT THIS!


With DCarbon on millions of vehicles WORLDWIDE we can…MAKE A POSITIVE CLIMATE CHANGE with less HC, CO, and NOx !



What we need

We need a lot more than money…We need your implication for a positive climate change by sharing, promoting and advertising the DCarbon project



We are presenting here, a funding request for up to $ 1 million Canadian.

This project will allow us to achieve two key (2) objectives:

• Create a worldwide community of passionate people committed to promote and use the DCarbon product for AIR quality improvement.

• Raise sufficient funds for mass production of the DCarbon product at the lowest possible price

Funds raised will be used to achieve the following key project milestones

Manufacture and distribution of the 5,000 units of the DCarbon product at the lowest cost (92.5% of budget)

  • Setting deployment and website operation to ensure effective communication with contributors

  • Management and automation of the DCarbon manufacturing processes for mass production

  • Management, manufacturing, packaging, storage and distribution of up to 50,000 FREE DCarbon units

Logistics support for installation and troubleshooting (7.5% of budget)

  • Website and user feedback management system

  • Professional videos for easy installation on gas engines

  • Set up of a technical support team and operations 5 days a week, for users. (website, blog)

  • Administration of the entire project.

If we obtain LESS or MORE money than the goal of $1 millions Cdn, we will use these funds to manufacture and distribute the largest possible number of units while still pursuing the same DREAM of creating the largest possible grassroots movement of motor vehicles owners/leasers to become active SMOG BUSTER by making their own motor vehicle environmentally friendly.

Risks and Challenges

  • The first challenge in this project is to reach the largest number of contributors and contributions.
  • The second challenge is to obtain the involvement of the largest possible number of contributors to share and promote the DCarbon project worldwide.
  • The third challenge is to install an excellent Internet tool for all users of the DCarbon product to communicate their satisfaction.
  • The manufacturing risk has been well managed. Our partner, Keltech inc., who participated in the R & D and product design is capable of producing 50,000 units a month in the second month of operation.What you will get

What you will get



It is a win-win situation for EVERYONE and the environment.

IMAGINE A POSITIVE CLIMATE CHANGE with less toxic pollutants like HC, CO, and NOx produced by millions of vehicles WORLDWIDE using DCarbon!



Contribution choices:

PERKS 1$ = Smog Buster Helper

PERKS 10$ = Smog Buster Supporter

PERKS 25$ = Aware Smog Buster

PERKS 50$ = Concerned Smog Buster

PERKS 75$ = Active Smog Buster

PERKS 100$ = Committed Smog Buster

PERKS 200$ = Certified Smog Buster

PERKS 1000$ = Level I Smog Buster promoter

PERKS 5000$ = Level II Smog Buster promoter

PERKS 10000$ = Level III Smog Buster promoter

We hope that DCarbon users will demonstrate their pride for their ECO-ACTION by using this type of sticker on their vehicle.


We will launch a request among Indiegogo contributors to design the best sticker or any other way to demonstrate their pride in improving AIR Quality at gas exhaust pipe …one engine at a time.

Other ways to help

Click Here to register yourself and share the project on facebook! 


You can also use Indiegogo sharing tools!

The pollutant produced by gasoline engines affects us all. All humans have an interest to reduce or eliminate toxic and deadly pollution produced by internal combustion engines, for themselves and their children. So, we thank you very much for spreading the word and promoting this HumanitAIR project.

We want to thank in profound way all participants and contributors to this  DCarbon project.


Cliquer ICI pour de obtenir une copie du projet DCarbon en français.
